Pre-Game Insights: The Colorado Rockies and the Detroit Tigers meet Wednesday in MLB action from Comerica Park.
This will be the second installment in a three-game series.
Casey Mize will be the starter for the Tigers, with a season record of 2-6 and a 4.30 ERA in 18 starts.
Tanner Gordon will start for the Rockies, with a season record of 0-5 and a 7.55 ERA in his first seven starts.
Seven of the Rockies' last eight games have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Three of the last four games between the Rockies and Tigers have gone OVER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 OVER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Tigers' last five home games against National League opponents.
The 'Inning 1 OVER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Rockies' last three games.
